mapper.select: select a.description, u.user_name user_name, u.user_dept user_dept, u.user_id user_id from bops_coupon_exchange_audit as a left join bops_user as u on a.audit_user_id = u.user_id where coupon_exchange_id = #{couponExchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.`audit_time` desc
